title: Newest champion vs. old champions
body:
So the new champion flies through space crushing stars and shit.

Now you really expect us to believe a guy with a sword should stand a chance against him?

replies.body: well, Jax is canonically the most powerful champion in the game, so yes, I do.

have you not read the story of this game?
all champs regardless of their abilities, once join the League, their abilities gets suppressed/weaken
When in need for killing a Star Forger, call {{champion:432}}
Well Pantheon can jump into the air and land on the ground with a nice thump so if he grabs the new champion he can slam him on the ground and Jax can finish him.
